languages.text: "У преступного отребья боевой дух слаб — скоро они сдадутся".
"The criminal rabble's morale is low. They will surrender soon."
languages.original_text: "У преступного отребья боевой дух слаб — скоро они сдадутся".

traits.locale_text: "The criminal rabble's morale is low. They will surrender soon."
"The criminal rabble's morale is low. They will surrender soon."
"The criminal rabble's morale is low. They will surrender soon."
"The criminal rabble's morale is low. They will surrender soon."

languages.text: "Die Moral des kriminellen Gesindels ist gering. Sie werden rasch aufgeben."
languages.original_text: "The criminal rabble's morale is low. They will surrender soon."

traits.locale_text: "Die Moral des kriminellen Gesindels ist gering. Sie werden rasch aufgeben."

languages.text: "Suçlu ayaktakımının morali bozuk. Yakında teslim olurlar."
languages.original_text: "The criminal rabble's morale is low. They will surrender soon."

traits.locale_text: "Suçlu ayaktakımının morali bozuk. Yakında teslim olurlar."

languages.text: «La escoria criminal está desmoralizada. No tardarán en rendirse».
languages.original_text: "The criminal rabble's morale is low. They will surrender soon."

traits.locale_text: «La escoria criminal está desmoralizada. No tardarán en rendirse».

languages.text: “那些乌合之众是一盘散沙，他们很快就会投降。”
languages.original_text: "The criminal rabble's morale is low. They will surrender soon."

traits.locale_text: “那些乌合之众是一盘散沙，他们很快就会投降。”

languages.text: « Le moral de ces racailles est au plus bas. Ils vont probablement se rendre rapidement. »
languages.original_text: "The criminal rabble's morale is low. They will surrender soon."

traits.locale_text: « Le moral de ces racailles est au plus bas. Ils vont probablement se rendre rapidement. »

languages.text: 「犯罪者どもの士気は低い。もうすぐ降参する」
languages.original_text: "The criminal rabble's morale is low. They will surrender soon."

traits.locale_text: 「犯罪者どもの士気は低い。もうすぐ降参する。」
